item.description:
LET TALK OVER COFFEE FOR THE UPCOMING MONTH OF AUGUST... TO GET IN SOME OF THE THOUGHTS AND EVENTS WE WANT TO FOR THE LAST SUMMER MONTH. ..... OR JUST COME FOR THE COMPANY FOR BREAKFAST.... MAYBE WE COULD HEAD FOR THE WATER FOR A SWIM AT THE HARTLAND DAM.... KAYAK THAT AFTERNOON... MAYBE TAKE A HIKE

 

I have added Tubing down the White River with Pink Tubes for only $10 for the 3 1/2 trip... Hope others will join me.. and have this leasure afternoon in a tube....

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: BREAKFAST AT THE FORT
